document_data.mainbody:
aladras Yarlamm was a Red Wizard of the 14 century DR who survived combat with the Simbul, only to be summoned by her and die in combat with devils in that year.
He knew of a method to convert flames to acid.
He had wands.
Kaladras Yarlamm once fought the Simbul and survived unknown to him, however, shed thrust some of her blood into his body, where it had lodged, making him vulnerable to her blood ring spell later on. Decades later, she used the spell in the , calling him to her service in Avernus, where he was killed before he could defend her.
